reviewText:
Sexy Sorority Sisters by NightVision is fifty-nine minutes long and was released in 1995. The video is actually fifty-six minutes long. Three minutes are previews of other NightVision videos. The video starts off with a scene in the weight\gym room. They ladies switch from clothes on to clothes off, also the scene switches from color and black and white. We are introduced to nine college students in this video.

1. Tiffany is a sophomore who is a Philosophy major and she is totally nude
2. Heather is a sophomore who is a History major and she is semi-nude
3. Janet is a junior who is Journalism major and she attends Ohio State and is totally nude
4. Monique is a senior who is advertising major and she attends Michigan State and is totally nude
5. Lisa is a junior and is a Pre-Law major and hails from Iowa. Lisa is totally nude during her scene
6. Heather is a sophomore and is a History major. She only showed her breasts.
7. Lisa is a junior and is a Physical Therapy major; she was nude, but you had to wait for it.
8. Olga is a sophomore who is a Theater major from Penn State. Olga was topless while masturbating
9. Leslie is a sophomore who is English major and she is totally nude

Also there is a dorm room scene where the girls are playing cards and having a pillow fight. This is one of the better nude videos from NightVision. Sexy Sorority Sisters by NightVision gets an AAA+++.
